name: GildenTide
blurb: A new independent 2-D fighting game set in an industrial steampunk world, with gameplay designed for casual and veteran fighting gamers

rewards.reward: Get the official HD GildenTide wallpaper! Impress your friends and spark their intrigue with this snazzy screen picture.
Get a digital copy of the GildenTide soundtrack by Giancarlo Montalbano. Oh yeah, and you get the HD background to boot!
Get a copy of GildenTide sent to you on the day of release, along with the background, the soundtrack, and a hearty salutation from us!

You get the background, the soundtrack, and the game. But wait, there's more! You will also receive the official GildenTide t-shirt. Access to these shirts will only be available at demo sites and to you wonderful folks on Kickstarter until release.

In addition to all of the gifts listed previously, you will receive a copy of the official GildenTide comic book hand illustrated by Giancarlo Montalbano! Learn the story of a world where Tesla's ideas all become reality and Britain turns into a mechanized jungle full of wonder and action!

Ever wanted to be a game tester? You will be able to register as a beta tester to give our near-final build a test ride! Your name will be added into the credits of the game as a tester as you help give us feedback on each character and the overall game. Your assistance will be essential to giving players a quality fighting game experience that is as balanced as possible! Oh yeah, and we'll send you the rest of the prizes listed previously too!

You want all the prizes listed previously, including the beta testing position? You got it! For your amazing donation, you will receive a custom piece of GildenTide art created just for backers at this level as a poster signed by Giancarlo! We will even send it to you digitally in such a way that you could use it on your arcade fighting game stick or whatever you'd like. Show off your limited edition art while you decimate your opponent with sheer skill and steampunkery!

Whoever you are, we could not send enough thank you notes to show our gratitude! Not only will we throw the background, soundtrack, game, t-shirt, comic book, beta testing position, and poster in your box, but you will have your very own background character! We will take your suggestions and make your idea into a British-steampunk background character in one of the GildenTide stages. You want a sweet handlebar mustache? You got it! You want steam powered mechanical parts? You got it! Whatever you would like on your character, we will work with you to make it happen!

I don't know who you are, but for the most bodacious benefactors on the planet, there lies the ultimate prize. All the prizes listed before, and I mean all of them, are yours! For your donation, you will also receive an extremely limited edition custom steampunk arcade stick built by B15SDM Designs specifically for our game GildenTide. We will also be contacting you personally throughout our process to show you footage before it reaches the public. Your input will help us make GildenTide the best game it can be! You will officially be a GildenTide VIP now and at any event we are at!
